name: EditAttachedObject
notes: You can move the camera while editing by pressing and holding the spacebar (or W in vehicle) and moving your mouse.
warnings: Players will be able to scale objects up to a very large or negative value size. Limits should be put in place using OnPlayerEditAttachedObject to abort the edit.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Enter edition mode for an attached object.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to enter in to edition mode

params_body.name: index
params_body.description: The index (slot) of the attached object to edit
